title: Any update on Dynamic Que?
body:
C'mon Riot... it's been two days... two whole days. 
Give us an update on what's happening. Hell, we are fine if you tell us that "It doesn't work at all anymore". 

JUST SAY SOMETHING.

We don't care if its bad or good. Just tell us what's going on.

And radio silence is not an effective choice for you to the players. Makes us think you don't care. :(

replies.body:
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements-en/10wde8H7-20012016-euw-dynamic-queue-system-disabled-further-details?comment=0073

Thanks to  RIOT TMX  for giving an update. just spreading the word at this point to other concerned players.

they are posting some info, its just that they dont particularly care about the boards so the info is not readily available here.... 

check out riot lyte twitter or the reddit page, or even EU boards....

this was from lyte 12ish hrs ago on twitter:

> Working on a small live test of new Champ Select on VN server. Fingers crossed it goes well

If they dont care about the boards at all then..wtf that doesnt even make sense. If I want info on league I want to be able to go to the league website and see what I want to know. That doesnt make sense. Not getting angry at you. Just saying

i totally agree, and this is the argument that many people have used for some years now after they removed the very popular forums and created this "beta" reddit board....... 

but this is what we have, and the community shares the info it finds on other sites and puts it here eventually, but its becoming a memes and jokes sort of place more than anything.... look in gameplay, check out how many joke posts / satire posts / no gp&b  there are with no moderation..... while in GD, where people are suppose to be "free" people dont stop complaining about moderation, and did we forget there is even a roleplaying section that is hidden from normal view, or that a user has created an "add-on" to the boards called fek that prob holds the boards together better than riot ever cares too......... and riot red responses? ya, go to reddit or twitter for those......


sry, after reading this over it seems a lil bitter =^D i dont think i meant to be, to your OP..... if u want info on the game think about looking on:


reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends

twitter: for example riot lyte:
https://twitter.com/RiotLyte?ref_src=twsrc^google|twcamp^serp|twgr^author

surrender at 20
http://www.surrenderat20.net/

happy hunting and remember its a game, we should have fun
thanks, ill head over and check it out there on reddit

They should be posting on here, since that would make sense.

But you the real MVP for directing us to where it is.
too bad riot doesnt post information about these things on the boards.... which are for posting information about these things... lol
say something im giving up on you
